name: Bagel Bash
description:
A sidescrolling-runner fan game about ProtonJon and Lucahjin's cat Bagel!
I do not own ANY of the music (ver2 uses music under Creative Commons).
Bagel Bash will also be releasing on Google Play (minus all the stuff that isn't mine!).
Thank you all for the amazing support <3

SUPER Bagel Bash | Ver 1.1.0
R E T R O:
- SUPER Bagel Bash is here!
- Collect cookies to increase your score!
- Hitbox centered on Bagel
SFX:
- Volumes for some effects have been adjusted
Misc:
- Jon's PB has been immortalized
- Reduced self-plugging

[Older versions have been archived]

Controls:
Jump - Spacebar, Up, Left Click
Pause - Escape
Epic Twitch Memes - 7 (not available in ver 2)

SUPER Controls:
Move - Left, Right, A, D
Start - Escape
